summary: This is an email chain between attorneys discussing a court conference transcript and the Epstein estate. It reveals that the estate identified Epstein's brother as the sole beneficiary and mentions a problematic draft protocol from Feinberg. The emails are between Roberta Kaplan and other legal professionals.

persons.name: Roberta Kaplan
persons.context: The primary sender/author of the email, discussing court proceedings and communications regarding the Epstein estate. She is referred to as 'Robbie'.

persons.name: Bennet Moskowitz
persons.context: Mentioned as having made a statement at an earlier court conference before Magistrate Judge Freeman regarding the Epstein estate.

persons.name: M.J. Freeman
persons.context: Presided over an earlier conference where Bennet Moskowitz made a statement about the Epstein estate.

persons.name: J Failla
persons.context: Presided over a conference where Roberta Kaplan made statements about the Epstein estate; the judge assumed claims could be for 'millions upon millions of dollars'.

persons.name: MI Conlon
persons.context: Sent the transcript of a court conference to Roberta Kaplan and others.

persons.name: M L. Doniger
persons.context: Copied on the email chain regarding the Epstein estate conference transcript.

persons.name: Feinberg
persons.context: Referenced in relation to a 'draft protocol' for the Epstein victim compensation fund, which is described as a 'disaster'.

connections.description: Colleagues at Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP, communicating about legal case transcripts and strategy.
Both are attorneys involved in legal proceedings concerning the Epstein estate, with Kaplan referencing statements Moskowitz made in court.
Kaplan appeared before Judge Failla in a conference and made statements about the Epstein estate's beneficiary.

events.title: Court Conference on Epstein Estate
events.description: A court conference was held, presumably regarding litigation involving the Epstein estate. A transcript was circulated among attorneys.

events.title: Receipt of Feinberg Draft Protocol
events.description: Attorneys received a draft protocol from Feinberg (likely for the Epstein Victim Compensation Program), which was described as 'exactly as much of a disaster as we expected'.

keyFacts: The Epstein estate identified Jeffrey Epstein's brother as the sole beneficiary, as stated by attorney Roberta Kaplan in a court conference before Judge Failla.
A draft protocol from Feinberg (for the victim compensation fund) was received and described as a 'disaster' by the attorneys.
Judge Failla assumed that claims against the estate, even excluding punitive damages, could be for 'millions upon millions of dollars'.
The email chain shows legal strategy discussions among attorneys representing parties in litigation related to the Epstein estate.
